specials_info: Magic Mouth Riddle: "Name the one of cold, foretold twofold."; Answer: "STONE GOLEM"; Teleports you to 9E/8N
Magic Mouth Riddle: "Name the endless bypass and your path shall be guaranteed."; Answer: "SINISTER"; Opens the door at 1E/6N
Crystal Golem: The "Crystal Sword" is the only weapon that beats this guardian.
